question: Are Pennie customers still responsible for taking "affordable coverage" when it comes to job-based coverage
text:
Are Pennie customers still responsible for taking "affordable coverage" when it comes to job-based coverage
          
        
Yes, individuals (along with their spouse and dependents, if eligible) with an offer of job-based coverage that meets affordability standards will remain ineligible for financial assistance through Pennie. The American Rescue Plan does not change other eligibility provisions outside of household income under the ACA.
